# About this site

Introducing `vanilla` - a static blog generator built with Next.js, unified.js, @primer/react, and the GitHub API! `vanilla` uses SSG technology to create and publish blog posts using Markdown syntax. It also leverages the GitHub API to retrieve user information and reduce user configuration. With `vanilla`, you can focus on writing content and easily share your thoughts with the world!

-- Generated by `gpt3.5`
